subtitle: Your community
generalInfo: Click or tap on an avatar (a person) to start.
finalInfo: Press the button to go to the animation
contextualInfoAvatar: First, select and customize your own avatar.
selectOthersPeople: other avatars. These represent other people around you.
vulnerableDescription: Why is this person at greater risk? This person is: (check all that apply)
step5: Choose your hair colour. Select accessories (glasses, facial hair) if you want, and save your avatar.
step6: Now choose and customize 2 avatars of people around you who are at greater risk if they get sick: babies or children, older people, people dealing with a health condition (cancer, diabetes, asthma, etc.) or people who have other health risks.
step7: Finally, choose and customize 6 other avatars. These represent other people around you.
step8: Once all 9 avatars are made, click or tap the green button to go to the animation.
step9: Press green button to start animation.

vulnerableOptions.name: A person with a more fragile immune system (cancer, diabetes, or other conditions)
